measure_info.long_name: Health literacy composite
measure_info.short_description: Health literacy composite captures the adult population's ability to obtain, process, and understand basic health services to make appropriate health decisions
measure_info.long_description: The health literacy composite captures the adult population's ability to obtain, process, and understand basic health services to make appropriate health decisions. Health literacy composite is based on variables of demographic characteristics, health status, and health care use.
measure_info.statement: The health literacy composite for {features.name} is {value}.

measure_info.long_name: Dental care availability by count
measure_info.short_description: Count of dentists based on provider locations
measure_info.long_description: Count of dentists based on provider locations. Address data were collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.
measure_info.statement: There are {value} dentists in {features.name}.

measure_info.long_name: Dental care geographic availability (2 step-enhanced floating catchment areas)
measure_info.short_description: Index of dental care availability based on supply and demand of providers
measure_info.long_description: Dental care availability based on 2-step enhanced floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of dentists per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a provider is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for dentists (population served by dentists). Provider address data were collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.
measure_info.statement: The dental care availability for {features.name} is {value}.

measure_info.long_name: Dental care geographic availability (2 step-enhanced floating catchment areas)
measure_info.short_description: Index of dental care availability based on supply and demand of providers
measure_info.long_description: Dental care availability based on 2-step enhanced floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of dentists per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a provider is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for dentists (population served by dentists). Provider address data were collected from WebMD's online Physician Directory.
measure_info.statement: The dental care availability for {features.name} is {value}.

measure_info.long_name: Emergency medical services availability by median drive time to the ten closest facilities in minutes
measure_info.short_description: Median drive time (minutes) to the ten closest emergency medical services facilities
measure_info.long_description: Median drive time in minutes to the ten closest emergency medical services facilities. Facility location data were collected from the Homeland Infrastructure Foundation-Level Data (HIFLD) repository. Drive times were computed using Open Source Routing Machine (Using roads for year 2021).
measure_info.statement: The median drive time to the ten closest emergency medical service facilities to {features.name} is {value}.

measure_info.long_name: Availability of emergency medical services by count
measure_info.short_description: Count of emergency medical services facilities based on facility locations
measure_info.long_description: Count of emergency medical services facilities based on facility locations. Location data was collected from the Homeland Infrastructure Foundation-Level Data (HIFLD) repository.
measure_info.statement: There are {value} emergency medical services facilities in {features.name}.

measure_info.long_name: Emergency medical services geographic availability (3-step floating catchment areas)
measure_info.short_description: Index of emergency medical services availability based on supply and demand of facilities
measure_info.long_description: Emergency medical services availability based on 3-step floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of facilities per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a facility is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for facilities (adult population).
measure_info.statement: The emergency medical services availability for {features.name} is {value}.
